name: High School Varsity Fashion - Design Star Boutiques by "Fun Free Kids Games"
name_original: High School Varsity Fashion - Design Star Boutiques by "Fun Free Kids Games"
description:
- Sponsored by "FREE APP TODAY", which brings you free apps daily, download High School Varsity Fashion so that more apps can be free for a day! -


Ever Dream of Creating your very own Fashion Empire? Now you Can!

Building your very own clothing design line has never been so easy and fun With High School Varsity Fashion Pop Star Design Frenzy.

With over 30 shops your sure to find your style!
1000's of clothing items and accessories the possibilities are endless!

Keep your eye on the prize...complete jobs, earn money to shop, the more you shop the closer you are to owning your very own boutique.

As you build your Empire your success allows you to travel the world and your popularity lands you your dream date.

So if one of your hidden passions is being a "Fashion Designer"? Experience high end awesome fashion fun! Let your creativity flow design your own look and share with friends on facebook, twitter, by email.
